import { Col, Image, Row } from 'react-bootstrap' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import React from 'react' import { formatTo3Digits } from '../../../helpers/numbers' import PokemonTypeTag from '../../pokemonTypes/show/PokemonTypeTag' import ShowPokemonLoader from './ShowPokemonLoader' import Text from '../../../components/presentation/Text' const PokemonDetails = ({ pokemon, id }) => { if (!pokemon.id) return (
) return ( {pokemon.number}. {pokemon.name}
) } const mapState = state => ({ pokemon: state.pokemon.single }) export default connect(mapState)(PokemonDetails)
